Subject: Re: meeting a old friend

Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 129

::Obfucious::
    He dove into his work on the emitter.  The damage wasn't as extensive as 
he had imagined it would be.  A few disconnected wires, a few blown circuits, 
a missing coupling or two to hold it all together.  He wandered back to the 
supply depot he had found earlier and got the tools and parts he needed and 
returned to repair the emitter.  He finished it quickly and began to think 
about the new shield concept.  He tried to jury-rig it but the power output 
would have been too immense for the emitter to handle, so much for that idea. 
 He did some more planning and decided that the energon needed would have 
been a prohibitively large amount.  He walked back to the bridge.  "The 
shields are up and running now."
